name: .FCPEVENT File Extension
summary: Learn about .FCPEVENT files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Event created and used by Final Cut Pro X (FCPX), an OS X professional video editor; contains information describing an event in FCPX, which includes related media and any metadata associated with that media.

content: FCPX uses events to store and organize media. When you import media files into the application, they are inserted into a new or existing event. When you create a FCPX project, you bring clips from an event into the project and build a sequence of story elements, which eventually is your movie.
NOTE: FCPEVENT files store data in an SQLite format, which means that they can be edited by SQLite editors.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
